thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 18 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Green Plains Partners Increases Quarterly Distribution

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Green Plains Partners Increases Quarterly Distribution
text:
Jan 18 (Reuters) - Green Plains Partners LP:
* GREEN PLAINS PARTNERS INCREASES QUARTERLY DISTRIBUTION * GREEN PLAINS PARTNERS LP - ‍DECLARED QUARTERLY CASH DISTRIBUTION OF $0.47 PER UNIT ON ALL OF ITS OUTSTANDING COMMON AND SUBORDINATED UNITS FOR Q4 2017​
* GREEN PLAINS PARTNERS LP - ‍NEW QUARTERLY CASH DISTRIBUTION IS 1.0-CENT INCREASE OVER PREVIOUS QUARTERLY DISTRIBUTION OF $0.46 PER UNIT​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
